title: David’s Supporters Join Him
summary: Warriors from every tribe come to support David while he is at Ziklag and Hebron. Their unity and willingness to follow God’s chosen king are emphasized as a sign of divine favor.

faq.question: Who joined David at Ziklag?
faq.answer: Mighty men from various tribes, including Benjamin and Gad.

faq.question: What does this chapter show about David’s leadership?
faq.answer: That people from all Israel recognized God’s hand on him and rallied to his side.
